import React from 'react' import { Link } from '../../../i18n' import {useRouter} from 'next/router' import { Cookies } from 'react-cookie'; import styles from './styles.module.scss' import clsx from 'clsx' const cookies = new Cookies(); function Sidebar() { const router = useRouter() const [vissible, setVissible] = React.useState(false) const vissibleBtn = cookies.get('token') === 'null' ? true : true const toggleVisible = () => { setVissible(!vissible) } return (
{vissibleBtn && ( )}
) } export default Sidebar
